comment.author: 11876841@N07
comment._content: World Champion Trick and Fancy Roper, rancher. Born 1883, died 1951.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started an entry for her in Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Florence_LaDue

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: adonis_sepquin and Richard Arthur Norton, Thanks for the additional information! We'll update the record with more details. It does appear her 'stage name' was actually Flores LaDue, rather than Florence. She is named as Flores in both the Cowgirl Hall of Fame and in this article on the Calgary Stampede used in the Canadian Encyclopedia, so we'll note that as well.
